description:
Souma goes out with Hayate and Shun to see the movie adapation of Igarashi Motoharu`s book, the movie that Takayuki did the promo campaign for. Seeing Hayate being even more excited about the movie after seeing Takayuki`s ad makes Souma want to create something that will move people in similar ways. After the movie, the group runs into Motoharu and end up going to the mawarimichi cafe together. On the way there, Souma asks Motoharu a certain question.
Source: crunchyroll
